mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Users (user_name, user_email, user_password, user_birthdate, user_id, user_joined) VALUES (#{us_name}, #{us_email}, SHA2(#{us_password},256), #{us_birthdate}, #{us_id}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT user_id as us_id, user_password as us_password, user_name as us_name, user_email as us_email, user_birthdate as us_birthdate, user_joined as create_At FROM Users WHERE user_id = #{us_id} AND user_password = SHA2(#{us_password},256)
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET last_logout_time = #{logoutTime} WHERE user_id as us_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Users WHERE user_id = #{id}
